text: I said she could stay with us, Mum.
I just thought she feels better.
Oh, this won't be for long.
Well, you can stay as long as you want my love.
All right, shall we get you off to bed then?
You should have given me some warm.
I'll have to put the electric blanket on.
In a bedroom, Peter unpacks her suitcase.
The middle-aged woman opens her green case.
Lifting a bundle of pajamas, Peter finds a sheet of paper labeled Lancaster North Hospital Discharged Sheet.
He closes the suitcase and brings glory to the pajamas.
